item.description:
This is going to be what will hopefully be the first monthly games night at my place.

Games to be played will be decided on the day of, however, I have:


  • 1 deck of playing cards (michigan rummy, poker, 500, etc.)
  • Double Uno deck
  • Fluxx
  • Chrononauts
  • Scrabble
  • Collection of strategy games
  • Killer Bunnies


If you have a favorite game that you'd like to play, feel free to bring it and teach everyone!

Games to begin as soon as enough people show up. I'll have some snacks available. Bring your own beverages.

Evening will run from 6:30 to 10ish.

I will be preparing a couple of batches of Chili (white and traditional) that day for anyone who would like to arrive earlier and have dinner.
item.how_to_find_us: Call me when you get to my building and someone will let you in.
item.name: Games Night
